definitions.definition: Any of several minerals , aluminosilicates of sodium , potassium , calcium or magnesium , that have a porous structure (originally, those which swelled and gave off water when heated); they are used in water softeners and in ion exchange chromatography .

main_definition: ( mineralogy ) Any of several minerals , aluminosilicates of sodium , potassium , calcium or magnesium , that have a porous structure (originally, those which swelled and gave off water when heated); they are used in water softeners and in ion exchange chromatography . [from 18th c.]
